video.title: School for Little Vampires
video.synopsis: A young vampire who hates blood and has the hots for a mortal girl makes mischief at a school for vampires that's housed inside an abandoned castle.

episodes.synopsis: When an inspector arrives to test the vampires' skills, it's up to Oskar to save the school's reputation; Stoker sets his sights on a blood donor bus.
episodes.title: Dr. Ironfang /  Give Blood, Saves Lives

episodes.synopsis: Sunshine invites Oskar to dinner, where Polidori peppers him with tests; Caught outside at sunrise, Oskar and Klot must find a place to hide -- fast!
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner / Spring Ahead

episodes.synopsis: On his birthday, a lonely Klot falls under the spell of a monster plant; Leechy's new invention ends up in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: Feed Me / Cape of Fear

episodes.synopsis: Oskar races to stop his rebellious shadow from playing evil tricks; An old ritual forces the teachers to trade places with the students for a night.
episodes.title: Shadow Play / Back to Front

episodes.synopsis: When the students launch a school newspaper, Oskar stumbles on an intriguing cover-up; Strange happenings at the castle put Oskar in detective mode.
episodes.title: All The Count's Men/  Inspector Oskar

episodes.synopsis: An old nemesis arrives at the school hoping to steal Oxblood's job; Ashley takes over Oskar's body on the night of a big dance.
episodes.title: Fresh Blood / Demon Within

episodes.synopsis: The vampires fight about what to do with a lost chick, only to discover it's no ordinary bird; Stoker sneaks out to audition for a movie.
episodes.title: Fluffy / Movie Bites

episodes.synopsis: A bump on the head leaves Lenny acting strangely; As the kids practice scaring humans away, an obnoxious tourist proves to be a big challenge.
episodes.title: What’s Up with Lenny? / The Guest from Hell

episodes.synopsis: Oskar and friends accidentally awaken a legendary vampire with a big appetite; A carnival vampire leads Polidori and the students on a wild chase.
episodes.title: Count Fracula's Return / Dark Carnival

episodes.synopsis: The vampires race to find daytime items during a total eclipse scavenger hunt; A new werewolf exchange student is nothing like the class expected.
episodes.title: Totally Eclipsed  / The Vampire Who Cried Werewolf

episodes.synopsis: When the count is captured, Oskar and Klot scramble to save him from a terrible fate; Oskar makes a startling discovery in the dentist's chair.
episodes.title: Zoo Time / Baby Fang Blues

episodes.synopsis: A late-night flight turns chaotic when Oskar sees Sunshine and Polidori in danger; A quest for a secret beauty treatment leads Gothetta into a trap.
episodes.title: Tangled Web / The Pale Ashes of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Oskar's stuffy nose proves useful when the castle comes under attack; Tricks and traps abound as the students compete for glory in the Vampire Games.
episodes.title: A Bad Cold / Vampire Games

episodes.synopsis: Polidori falls in love with a mysterious ice skater, not realizing she's the enemy; Stoker tries to impersonate a young doctor at the hospital.
episodes.title: Vampires on Ice / Wunderkind

episodes.synopsis: Stoker leads the vampires in a homework rebellion, but power soon goes to his head; Oskar suspects Sunshine's new babysitter is up to no good.
episodes.title: Leadership / Trick or Treat

episodes.synopsis: As spring arrives at the castle, Ashley tries to find a soul mate; Stoker and Leechy lay claim to an old pirate treasure, only to learn it's cursed.
episodes.title: Ashley in Love / Vampirates

episodes.synopsis: The kids discover a secret passage that leads to a strange creature; When a notorious villain returns to the village, Oskar races to protect Sunshine.
episodes.title: It Comes from Beneath / Walpurg the Wicked

episodes.synopsis: The vampires try to cheer up Lenny with a clown, but nothing goes as planned; Oskar discovers vampire postal work is more exciting than he thought.
episodes.title: Lenny's Blues / All Work no Play

episodes.synopsis: Leechy's attempt at cooking has scary side effects; On his "bite-day," Lenny tells the kids how he became a vampire.
episodes.title: Home Alone / Bite Me

episodes.synopsis: When a lonely Missy won't let go of Lenny, Oskar tries to help; The kids sneak out to test their vampire skills on a human and end up in a bind.
episodes.title: Missy Makes a Move / Open All Night

episodes.synopsis: A rebellious young vampire lures Stoker into a life of crime; A visit from a pair of demanding guests tests the vampires' patience.
episodes.title: School for Suckers / The Code of the Vampires

episodes.synopsis: A fib puts Klot in a tricky position when his father comes to visit; A spoonful of the wrong medicine turns Gothetta's exam into a nightmare.
episodes.title: Father's Day / Mirror Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Oskar discovers he's not the first vampire to fall in love with a mortal; Gothetta's friendship with a lonely troll leads to trouble at school.
episodes.title: Coffin / Troll Ahead

episodes.synopsis: While the teachers are away, a stranger infiltrates the castle; A strong wind carries Ashley away just before an important visit from his uncle.
episodes.title: Klot Crumples and Skulldrudgery / Gone with the Wind

episodes.synopsis: A visiting psychologist vows to cure Oskar's fear of blood; Taking care of Sunshine's cats at the castle proves even trickier than Oskar expected.
episodes.title: Fear and Trembling / The Cat's Meow

episodes.synopsis: Oskar accidentally turns Sunshine into a bloodthirsty rebel; A crash course in wilderness survival forces Oskar and Stoker to work together.
episodes.title: Sunshine and Moonbeam /  Campfire

episodes.synopsis: Klot accidentally lets a pair of fugitives into the castle; Sunshine's scheme to teach a snobby relative a lesson puts Oskar in real danger.
episodes.title: Vampires and Robbers / He Ain't Heavy He's My Brother

episodes.synopsis: Stoker's hypnosis hits the wrong target; As Oskar goes on trial for brownie theft, the other vampires try to piece together what really happened.
episodes.title: Transformer / On My Honour, Your Honour

episodes.synopsis: A debate about the Truth Fairy's true nature divides the school; Leechy's new invention lands a fellow vampire in the hands of an alien hunter.
episodes.title: Truth Fairy / Vampires from Outer Space

episodes.synopsis: Leechy plays it cool to impress a girl, with disastrous results; An unlikely romance blossoms when Gothetta's love potion lands in the wrong hands.
episodes.title: Dr. Leechy and Mr. Cool / A Vampire's Kiss

episodes.synopsis: A run-in with a fortune teller leaves Stoker haunted by bad luck; The vampires try to keep Oxblood from learning what he really looks like.
episodes.title: Superstition / Hairless Mister

episodes.synopsis: Ashley finds a new calling when he accidentally rolls into town; A visiting Egyptian princess drives a wedge between Gothetta and the other vampires.
episodes.title: A Work of Ashley / The Mummy's Curse

episodes.synopsis: Oskar enters the crypt of a dreaded vampire and makes a surprising discovery; A visit from a vampire pop star rekindles an old rivalry.
episodes.title: Who's Vampello / The King of Goth'N'Roll

episodes.synopsis: The vampires try to find the one thing that scares the count; Polidori enters the castle in disguise, but he's not the only one with a sneaky plan.
episodes.title: How to Scare a Vampire / Inside Out

episodes.synopsis: Oskar panics when the count calls in a famous vampire-for-hire to get rid of Polidori; A human baby turns life at the castle upside down.
episodes.title: The Vampire Hunter Hunter / Hallo Baby

episodes.synopsis: When Klot stumbles upon a fortune, the vampires compete for his attention; The kids win a visit from their TV hero and discover he has a big secret.
episodes.title: Klot's Millions / Hero Today, Gone Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: A cure for Oskar's blood phobia has an unintended side effect; The count tries to bond with Oskar on a camping trip, but nothing goes as planned.
episodes.title: Topsy Turvy / Blood Relatives

episodes.synopsis: Oskar is roped into a vampire hunt with Polidori on the night of a blood barbecue; Stoker's love of wrestling gets him into a tricky predicament.
episodes.title: Undercover of the Night / The Arena of Terror

episodes.synopsis: The vampires return from a scary movie to find a zombie roaming the halls; When danger strikes, Klot puts his superhero practice to good use.
episodes.title: Zombie Amuck / Super Klot
